notes.privacy: Passenger NID is never sent to frontend; only supervisor/owner sees NID in backend.

visibility_rules.before_acceptance: Supervisor sees only booking_id, bus_id, status. NO passenger details.
visibility_rules.after_acceptance: Both passenger and supervisor see each other's name and phone.
visibility_rules.bus_details: Full bus details (boarding points, live location) only visible after booking acceptance.

notes.usage: Frontend can render UI, simulate API calls, and test real-time updates without backend.
notes.authentication: All protected endpoints require 'Authorization: Bearer {token}' header.
notes.websocket_connection: Connect to /ws/booking for booking updates, /ws/location/{bus_id} for live location tracking.
notes.date_format: All timestamps follow ISO 8601 format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS
notes.phone_format: Bangladeshi phone numbers: 11 digits starting with 01

roles.passenger: Can search buses, send booking requests, confirm tickets, view own tickets
roles.supervisor: Can publish buses, manage boarding points, accept/reject requests, share live location
roles.owner: Can register buses, manage supervisors, view all operations and reports
